name: maximum speed
displayName: maximum speed of one of YOUR designs (below 500m), measured in designer. Neter standard physics.

name: explosive damage
displayName: maximum explosive combo damage from the campaign/misisons/adventures of built in planets (standard game constants)

name: missiles destroyed
displayName: Enemy missiles destroyed in the campaigns/misisons/adventures of built in planets (standard game constants)

name: battle merits
displayName: Maximum battle merits scored in (fixed difficulty) campaign battles. The higher the ratio of enemy volume to your volume, and the less damage you sustain, the higher the merits you are awarded.

name: large godlies
displayName: kill large (>30k volume) godlies in (fixed difficulty) campaign / mission / adventure (built in planets and standard game constants)

name: small godlies
displayName: kill small (<30k volume) godlies in (fixed difficulty) campaign / mission / adventure (built in planets and standard game constants)

name: adventure progression
displayName: maximum adventure progression reached in Neter with standard game constants

name: commodities made
displayName: Produce commodities in fixed difficulty campaigns of a built in planet (with standard game constants)

name: commodities given
displayName: Gift commodities in fixed difficulty campaigns of a built-in planet (with standard game constants)

name: alpha strike
displayName: the highest volume destroyed per second you've achieved in a (fixed difficulty) campaign on a built-in planet.

name: sd kills
displayName: Scarlet dawn kills in fixed-difficulty campaigns, missions or adventures in Neter (standard game constants)
